Rename

Use the Rename dialog box (File | Rename) to change the name of an existing project database, project, or folder.

Field Descriptions

Name Enter a new name for the existing project database, project, or folder.
Workfile Location Workspace setting information displays only if you are renaming a post 5.3/6.0 project. This field displays the workfile location of the project you are renaming.
